meta.name: Everything on the Menu with Braun Strowman
meta.description: Everything on the Menu with Braun Strowman follows WWE Legend Braun Strowman as he eats his way across America, while on the road for WWE, ordering everything on every menu and trying to down every last bite.

videos.title: Florida Man vs Food
videos.overview: Braun vacations in Tampa, where the food might tap out before he does.
